original: 'od srung; gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed par 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /🔽kun chub par bya /
analyzed: 'od srung; gang la la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis nga la bkur stir byed par 'dod pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'dod pa des dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya / kun chub par bya /
translated: “Kāśyapa, whoever wishes to honor me with all the requisites of happiness, and wishes to worship me with all worship, should uphold this Dharma discourse of The Great Heap of Jewels.🔽They should master it,

original: 'od srung / de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @260b rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'od srung / de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @260b rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Kāśyapa, in that way they will make unsurpassed offerings to the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
translated: When the Blessed One had said this,

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
translated: the Venerable Mahākāśyapa, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas gathered from various buddha-fields, the bhikṣus, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //🔽'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do // 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
translated: They praised what the Blessed One had said.

original: 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'od srung gi le'u zhes bya ste /
translated: This is the chapter on the noble Mahākāśyapa, the thirty-third chapter in the Great Heap of Jewels discourse with a hundred thousand chapters.

original: 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'dus pa bzhi bcu gsum pa rdzogs so ////

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / sh'i lendra bo dhi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
translated: Translated, edited, and finalized by the Indian preceptors Jinamitra and Śīlendrabodhi, and the chief editor and translator Bandé Yeshé Dé.

original: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: It was also revised with the new terminology.
